jobs.title: Middle ML Backend Engineer
jobs.description: In charge of optimizing and instrumenting the services and libraries responsible for calculating order ETA, with a focus on reducing latency, improving traceability, and ensuring production stability. Responsible for developing new features and performance improvements for the ML models integrated into the microservices. Currently working on the development of a service for generating personalized communications using AWS Personalize, enriched with data from multiple internal sources. Closely collaborating with the data science team to ensure seamless integration between models and backend infrastructure.

jobs.title: Python Developer & Data Engineer
jobs.description: Responsible for maintaining and developing the microservice that calculates couriers' earnings for each order, as well as designing and maintaining the earnings and incentives datamarts. Also in charge of two additional microservices: one for estimating incentive burn using ML models and another for managing the configurations of the earnings microservice, including both front-end and back-end.
jobs.achievements: Trained and deployed an ML model in FastAPI that predicts the cost of over 30,000 incentives per week with a margin of error of $50 USD for 80% of the predictions. Rebuilt the incentives datamart after a database re-architecture, ensuring compatibility with the previous architecture. Automated, using Airflow, more than 8 manual processes performed daily by 3 people on the payments team. This not only helped avoid potential errors but also provided more timely solutions for the couriers.

jobs.title: Senior Data Analyst
jobs.description: Responsible for maintaining and managing the data analytics infrastructure for the Incentives team globally, ensuring the availability of accurate and reliable data to support strategic decision-making in the area.
jobs.achievements: Designed, implemented, and managed the central data analytics infrastructure for the Incentives team in 9 countries at Rappi, using tools like Apache Airflow and Snowflake to ensure the availability and integrity of reliable data. Successfully led an Incentives segmentation project, improving budget allocation and couriers' experience through intelligent segmentations based on Machine Learning models. Led the design and execution of A/B tests to enhance couriers' performance during Incentives periods.

jobs.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
jobs.description: Supporting the decision-making process of the Colombia operation by providing the necessary data and analysis.
jobs.achievements: Provided, optimized, and automated data and dashboards in PBI required for daily review of important metrics for the operation (consisting of more than 15 dashboards and over 200 queries). Created different predictive models to anticipate certain behaviors in couriers with up to 95% accuracy using multiple linear/logistic regressions and machine learning concepts. Additionally, built different DAGs in Apache Airflow to automate loading and visualization processes of data from different operation verticals.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Process and analyze information related to Pharma Operations management.
jobs.achievements: Designed and implemented an indicator, along with its Power BI dashboard, that allowed measuring the effectiveness with which Business Area made their sales estimates and verifying if non-compliance was caused by Production Area. Additionally, through Power BI, automated the process of creating multiple periodic presentations that were previously done manually, not only reducing the processing time but also improving the quality and analysis of the presented information.

jobs.title: Intern
jobs.description: Conducting man-hours assessments, mapping their production/administrative processes, and generating improvement opportunities.
jobs.achievements: Designed a tool that enabled the gathering of man-hours information for 211 products in a database of over 450,000 records. Implemented quantitative and qualitative tracking and control mechanisms and tools that allowed diagnosing the state of the Human Sterile Production Area. Created a tool to automatically schedule over 60 operators.

jobs.title: Operations Research Teaching Assistant
jobs.description: Provided after-hours support to students in the Operations Research course.
jobs.achievements: I deepened my understanding of the subject, improved my communication skills, helped other students prepare for various exams, and substituted for the professor in two in-person classes.
